headline: Targa Resources Corp. Announces Quarterly Dividend and Timing of Fourth Quarter 2025 Earnings Webcast
summary: HOUSTON, Jan. 15, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Targa Resources Corp. (NYSE: TRGP) (“Targa” or the “Company”) today announced its quarterly dividend on common shares with respect to the fourth quarter of 2025. Targa announced today that its board of directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.00 per common share, or $4.00 per common share on an annualized basis, for the fourth quarter of 2025. This cash dividend will be paid February 13, 2026, on all outstanding common shares to holders of
